# PASS - Financial Risk Assessment Services for the 2 Billion Trees Program

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: NRCan-5000075360
* **Publication Date**: February 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 20, 2024, 2:00:00 PM
* **Contracting Entity**: Natural Resources Canada

## Tender Description

This contract is issued under the Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) Supply Arrangement for financial risk assessment services to support the Contract “2 Billions Trees Program” (2GA) nationwide. We are seeking a reliable and experienced audit firm with expertise in audit and risk management services to be provided on an “as and when requested” basis under the terms and conditions of the contract. 

The selected firm will be contracted for a period of one (1) year plus an optional three (3) additional one-year periods. Four (4) business days will be required to cancel this contract. Only qualified Supply Arrangement Holders under PASS E60ZQ-180001/D have been invited to submit a proposal.

## Expected Contract Duration

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 28, 2025

## Contract Award Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the proposal that presents the highest combined rating of Technical Merit and Price.

## Geographic Scope

* **Region(s) of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Key Requirements

* Provide financial risk assessment services to support the Contract “2 Billions Trees Program” (2GA) nationwide
* Work on an “as and when requested” basis under the terms and conditions of the contract
* Perform on-site or remote audits and assessment meetings as required in accordance with the Service Standards in the contract

## Contracting Officer Contact

* Jason Mulligan, Contracting Officer
* Email: [Jason.Mulligan@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:Jason.Mulligan@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 553-8975
* Fax: N/A

You may reach out to the Contracting Officer directly to request additional information or clarification on the contract details.

Response Time: 4 business days
